contents.content: _{You must take three archetype feats before you can start another.}
_{Assurance: May choose to take 10 rather than roll.}
_{Sense undetected creatures in a 60ft cone; +2 to detect creatures in a 30ft cone.}
contents.title: _{Seek}

contents.content: _{Deduct hardness, then apply remaining damage to both shield and yourself.}
contents.title: _{Shield Block}

contents.content: _{On failing a Reflex save, take half damage.}
_{Listen to hidden creatures in a 60ft cone.}
_{+2 to detect creatures in a 30ft cone.}
_{When you attack a flat-footed opponent with an agile or finesse weapon/unarmed strike, or a ranged weapon.}
_{On the first round of combat, if you roll Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures that haven't acted yet are flat-footed.}
_{Not flat-footed to hidden, undetected or flanking creatures, or surprise attacks by creatures up to your level.}
_{When you make a critical hit with a suitable weapon, apply the weapon's critical specialisation effect.}
_{On hitting a flat-footed target, inflict an effect until the end of your next turn:}
_{When your strike hits a flat-footed creature and deals damage, they must also attempt a Fortitude save.}

defs.critical_failure: _{Paralysed for 4 rounds, knocked unconscious for 2 hours, or killed (your choice)}

contents.content: _{When using a finesse melee weapon, you may add DEX to damage rather than STR.}
